View on GitHub

Arcus Security

Azure Security development in a breeze

Installation

We provide a NuGet package per provider and area.

Here is how you consume secrets for Azure Key Vault:

PM > Install-Package Arcus.Security.Secrets.AzureKeyVault

Features

  • Interacting with Secrets
    • General
    • Consume from Azure Key Vault
      • Integrate with IConfiguration
  • Authentication
    • Azure Key Vault
